settings.text:
If you pre-order a product, your order will be shipped within 2-3 working days from the date which the item will be in stock.

The date of when the product will be in stock will be shown on the product pages of this website, and you'll receive confirmation of when the item will be ready to ship via email.

settings.title: How long will delivery take?
settings.text: We aim to deliver your order within 3 to 5 days and the vast majority of our orders arrive within this timescale. However, on rare occasions these can sometimes take longer due to unforeseen circumstances – tracking information should be available for you to check the progress of your order but if you have any questions or queries please email - hello@vitalgym.co.

settings.title: My item has arrived damaged, what do I do?
settings.text: If your order arrives damaged please contact us - hello@vitalgym.co and our team will get it resolved. Depending on the situation we will usually arrange a collective and exchange it for new. Please do not send any items back until you have contacted us and received our instructions.

settings.title: Do you offer free returns on unwanted items?
settings.text: We do not cover the cost of returning an unwanted item.

settings.title: Do you offer any discounts or promotions?
settings.text: Yes, we occasionally run promotions and discounts. Make sure you are following our socials and subscribed to our mailing list to keep up to date with any promotions and offers.

settings.title: How long do I have to make up my mind?
settings.text: We give our customers 14 days to ensure they are happy with the items they purchased. If 14 days have gone by since your purchase, unfortunately we can’t offer you a refund or exchange. For more information please read our Refund Policy.

settings.title: Can I use my equipment outdoors?
settings.text: Our equipment is designed to be used indoors and in dry conditions unless stated otherwise. Leaving items outside in wet conditions could result in rust which can impact the lifespan of your equipment.

settings.title: How do I return an unwanted item?
settings.text: To return your product, you should mail your product to: JPC Vital Gym UK LTD Unit 3 Queens Square Ascot Business Park Ascot SL5 9FE. You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund. Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you, may vary.

settings.title: What are your Terms & Conditions?
settings.text: You can read our terms and conditions here.

settings.title: Do you offer any financing options?
settings.text: Yes we do. We offer a variety different ways to pay, including Klarna and Clearpay.

settings.title: Can I track my orders?
settings.text: Once your order has been processed you will be sent an email with an updated status. To track your order you can go here or you can get in touch with our customer services team.
